name: Evelyn Parker
description: Evelyn Parker's intelligence and ambition drives her to demand more from life. Her goal of becoming a professional actress, and her rational head for the biz, led her to a job at the doll houseClouds, but this stepping stone in her career quickly became something much more permanent.It was in her days at Clouds where she met and befriendedJudy √Ålvarez. In 2077, Evelyn was a consort and frequent guest ofYorinobu ArasakaatKonpeki Plaza. TheVoodoo Boyslearned of this and hired her to acquire abraindancerecording of Yorinobu's suite for a planned heist. Evelyn realized that the Voodoo Boys were...
